author: zms9110750
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zms9110750 于 2018-9-28 23:55 编辑 

原文介绍To be able to craft theses flyings things, you'll first need to find a Phial of Animation (which can be found in the structure chests), this will unlock the recipes.[tr=transparent]The flying things are controlled by the forward key and your looking direction, they can be dismounted with the sneak key, in this case, the flying thing will return to your inventory.
[tr=transparent]The combo sneak + right click can be used to force the flying thing to appear in world without auto-mount, or force it to return in item shape)The broom can be colorized with any vanilla dye (with crafting recipes, or when the entity is in world by right clicking it with a dye) and you can remove the color with a wet sponge (the sponge won't be consumed).[tr=transparent]While riding a flying thing, you have 2 displayed bars : one for energy and the other for the actual speed (you can adjust the display of theses bars in the config in game)
The energy decreases when you're riding the flying thing and regens over time when not. When no energy left, the flying speed is reduced (defined by a server config option, default is 1/3 of the default max speed).
[tr=transparent]The flying things are only for one passenger to keep a small hitbox for easy move (but i'll add a larger version for 2 passengers allowing to easily transport animals & passive entities)NB : the flying things can move in water if the config option is enabled (and this also allows to see in water while riding the flying thing)

作者原话不翻译？介绍过于简陋
你需要在地牢找到材料
[tr=transparent]飞行时由你看的方向控制，他们可以用潜行卸下，这样物品将放回你的物品栏。
[tr=transparent]组合潜行+右键单击可用于强制飞行物放置于地面，或强制它以项目形状返回
扫帚可以用任何染料着色（制作配方，或者当用实体在世界上用染料右键单击时），你可以用湿海绵去除颜色（海绵不会被消耗）
[tr=transparent]在驾驶飞行物时，你有2个显示的条形图：一个用于能量，另一个用于实际速度（你可以调整游戏中配置中这些条形的显示）
当你骑着飞行的东西时，能量会随着时间的推移而减少。当没有剩余能量时，飞行速度降低（由服务器配置选项定义，默认为默认最大速度的1/3）。
[tr=transparent]飞行的东西只适合一位乘客保持一个小型的打火机便于移动（但我会为2名乘客增加一个更大的版本，允许轻松运输动物和被动实体）
注意：如果启用配置选项，飞行物可以在水中移动（这也允许在骑行时看到水中）
